results.body: SEOUL, South Korea -- North Korea said on Tuesday that it wanted to restore scuttled agreements with South Korea that could channel extensive investments from the developed South into the impoverished North. The request was conveyed in the first official interaction with visitors from the South since the death of the North's leader, Kim Jong-il.
results.title: North Korea Asks South to Restore Deal to Spur Investment
